ability.name: Infiltrate
ability.description: Use the target's Evasion as baseline when determining the thresholds for Heavy+ Hits.

ability.name: Swift Strike
ability.description: When you Move, you may make an Attack with this weapon.

ability.name: Dirty Fighting
ability.description: Slice an exposed tendon or muscle, either halving the target's Speed until the end of the round or giving it Bane(1) on its next Attack.

ability.name: Wrangle
ability.description: Pull the target adjacent to you if it's smaller than you, or pull youself adjacent to it if it's larger than you. If you're the same size, you choose.

ability.name: Lunge/Parry
ability.description: Lunge: You gain Reach(2) for this Attack. Parry: You gain Guard(1)

ability.name: Fencer
ability.description: Step 1 Space without provoking Opportunity Attacks before or after making the Attack Roll. If you move directly towards the target, gain Boon(1) on the Attack Roll. If you move away from the target, gain 1 Guard, lasting until you move.

ability.name: Fencer
ability.description: Step 1 Space without provoking Opportunity Attacks before or after making the Attack Roll. If you move directly towards the target, gain Boon(1) on the Attack Roll. If you move away from the target, prepare to counter, allowing you to Retaliate the next time someone moves into your Threat.

ability.name: Can Opener
ability.description: You may choose to attack the target's armor directly, without giving the target an opportunity to Retaliate.

ability.name: Piercing Thrust
ability.description: Your attack pierces all enemies in a line. Each subsequent hit reduces the Attack Roll by 5.

ability.name: Whirlwind
ability.description: Attack all Spaces within half of Reach. Each subsequent hit reduces the attack roll by 5.

ability.name: Cleave
ability.description: Attack three connecting spaces within the weapon's range. Each subsequent hit reduces the attack roll by 5.

ability.name: Push
ability.description: The Attack also pushes the target 1 per success Spaces.

ability.name: Ricochet
ability.description: If your Attack hits, it bounces to a secondary target of your choice within half of the weapons range, dealing 1 damage.

ability.name: Return
ability.description: At the end of the current Phase the boomerang returns to your hand, dealing 1 damage to each unit it passes through on its way back.

ability.name: Curved Shot
ability.description: You may curve a shot to ignore the Cover of a target.

ability.name: Twin Arrows
ability.description: You may make a single Attack Roll against two targets within the weapon's Range.

ability.name: Piercing Shot
ability.description: Your attack pierces all enemies in a line. Each subsequent hit reduces the Attack Roll by 5.

ability.name: Block
ability.description: When hit by an attack roll, raise your Damage Thresholds by 2.

ability.name: Blocker
ability.description: When hit by an attack roll, raise your Damage Thresholds by 3.

ability.name: Blockest
ability.description: When hit by an attack roll, raise your Damage Thresholds by 4.
